abstract: Under the terms of the deal, Crown Castle will buy the rights to run 9,100 towers for an average lease of 28 years, with the right to acquire the towers outright from AT&T in the future for about $4.2 billion. Crown Castle will also buy about 600 towers outright.

lead_paragraph: AT&T agreed on Sunday to lease or sell 9,700 cellphone towers to Crown Castle International, a big wireless tower operator, for $4.85 billion in cash.

headline.main: AT&T in $4.85 Billion Tower Deal With Crown Castle

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
